| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | [monst.c#line2806](/wiki/Monst.c#line2806 "Monst.c") |

The **piranha**, ;, is a [sea monster](/wiki/Sea_monster "Sea monster") in [NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack"). It shares its glyph with the far more deadly [kraken](/wiki/Kraken "Kraken"), but is not generally regarded as a significant threat.

*The following information pertains to an upcoming version ([NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.*

Piranha now have 18 speed and a second bite attack, which is identical to the first one.

## Encyclopaedia entry

They live in "schools." Many times they will wait for prey to come to the shallow water of the river. Then the large group of piranhas will attack. These large groups are able to kill large animals ... Their lower teeth fit perfectly into the spaces of their upper teeth, creating a tremendous vice-like bite ... Piranhas are attracted to any disturbance in the water.

\[ <http://www.animalsoftherainforest.com/> ]

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Piranha\&action=edit)*

[![This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/b/b0/Nh343-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of NetHack. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.4.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.4.3 "NetHack 3.4.3"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-343}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Piranha

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
; piranha
Difficulty 6
Attacks Bite 2d6
; piranha
Difficulty 6
Attacks

Bite 2d6

Base level 5
Base experience 56
Speed 12
Base AC 4
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 60
Nutritional value 30
Size small
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A piranha:

  • can swim.
  • can survive underwater.
  • cannot pick up items.
  • has no limbs.
  • is an animal.
  • has a serpent body.
  • can lay eggs.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • normally appears in small groups.
Reference monst.c#line2806

The piranha, ;, is a sea monster in NetHack. It shares its glyph with the far more deadly kraken, but is not generally regarded as a significant threat.

The following information pertains to an upcoming version (NetHack 3.7.0). If this version is now released, please verify that it is still accurate, then update the page to incorporate this information.

Piranha now have 18 speed and a second bite attack, which is identical to the first one.

Encyclopaedia entry

They live in "schools." Many times they will wait for prey to come to the shallow water of the river. Then the large group of piranhas will attack. These large groups are able to kill large animals ... Their lower teeth fit perfectly into the spaces of their upper teeth, creating a tremendous vice-like bite ... Piranhas are attracted to any disturbance in the water.

[ http://www.animalsoftherainforest.com/ ]


This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.4.3. Information on this page may be out of date.

The '''piranha''', {{monsym|piranha}}, is a [[sea monster]] in [[NetHack]].  It shares its glyph with the far more deadly [[kraken]], but is not generally regarded as a significant threat.

{{upcoming|NetHack 3.7.0|Piranha now have 18 speed and a second bite attack, which is identical to the first one.}}

==Encyclopaedia entry==

{{encyclopedia|They live in "schools." Many times they will wait for prey to come to the shallow water of the river. Then the large group of piranhas will attack. These large groups are able to kill large animals ... Their lower teeth fit perfectly into the spaces of their upper teeth, creating a tremendous vice-like bite ... Piranhas are attracted to any disturbance  in the water. 
|[ http://www.animalsoftherainforest.com/ ]
}}
